item.title: About
item.description: 👋🏽Hi there, I'm Mukund Shah, a Computer Science student. And, a web developer by current skills. Beside what I studied about computers and programming in school, I started my journey of programming with C, after few months of my high school graduation (March 2019). Right now, I'm involved in web development and soon will be Fluttering.😁🤭 I have also started to share some literary stuffs 📜 on Instagram. I have also done EPUBs 📚.
